snippet: PHILIPS--Beatrice Mellicker, died June 27, 2014, at age 90. Wife of the late Alvin. Mother of Marian, Rick, Carl, Julie, Wendy. Grandmother, aunt, cousin, friend. Memorial in New York in the fall....

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PHILIPS, BEATRICE MELLICKER

lead_paragraph: PHILIPS--Beatrice Mellicker, died June 27, 2014, at age 90. Wife of the late Alvin. Mother of Marian, Rick, Carl, Julie, Wendy. Grandmother, aunt, cousin, friend. Memorial in New York in the fall.
